name: Lunar Base Missile Defense
description:
This is a recreation of Missile Command for the itch.io Mini Jam 130: Lunar.  This project was put together for a Missouri State University class project.

Theme: Lunar

Limitation: 10 seconds.  All missiles have a 10 second flight time.  The player must destroy the missile before then or risk losing a building.

The game is a bit buggy, but I ran out of time.  I plan to do some upgrades as I find time for a fun project.  I also plan on upgrading from the blocks to some actual graphics... probably.

Known bugs features:

  • Firing below the turrets instantly creates an explosion.
  • Unlimited ammo!  I ran out of time before implementing ammo reload.
